text: Who built the ark according to the Bible?
explanation: Noah was commanded by God to build an ark to save his family and animals from the great flood. (Genesis 6-9)

text: How many disciples did Jesus have?
explanation: Jesus chose twelve disciples to be His closest followers, also called apostles. (Matthew 10:1-4)

text: Complete the verse: 'For God so loved the world that He gave His only begotten Son, that whoever believes in Him should not perish but have _____ life.'
explanation: This is John 3:16, one of the most well-known verses in the Bible.

text: Who was the first man created by God?
explanation: Adam was the first human created by God from the dust of the ground. (Genesis 2:7)

text: What was the first miracle Jesus performed?
explanation: Jesus turned water into wine at the wedding in Cana, His first recorded miracle. (John 2:1-11)

text: True or False: The Bible contains exactly 66 books.
explanation: The Protestant Bible contains 66 books: 39 in the Old Testament and 27 in the New Testament.

text: Who was thrown into the lion's den?
explanation: Daniel was thrown into the lion's den for praying to God, but God protected him. (Daniel 6)

text: Match the prophet with their major book: Isaiah
explanation: Isaiah is the author of the Book of Isaiah, one of the major prophetic books.

text: What was the name of Jesus' mother?
explanation: Mary was chosen by God to be the mother of Jesus. (Luke 1:26-38)

text: Complete the verse: 'The Lord is my shepherd, I shall not _____.'
explanation: This is from Psalm 23:1, one of the most beloved psalms.
